official-title.#text:
To withdraw certain Federal lands and interests located
		  in Pima and Santa Cruz counties, Arizona, from the mining and mineral leasing
		  laws of the United States, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Southern Arizona Public Lands
			 Protection Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

Subject to valid
			 existing rights, after the date of enactment of this Act—

header.#text:
Withdrawal of
			 Federal lands and interests located in Pima and Santa Cruz counties,
			 Arizona

text.#text:
all federally owned interests in National
			 Forest lands in Santa Cruz County and Pima County, Arizona, are withdrawn
			 from—

all forms of entry, appropriation, and
			 disposal under the public land laws;

location, entry, and patent under the
			 mining laws; and

operation of the mineral leasing and
			 geothermal leasing laws, and the mineral materials laws;

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in lands
			 in Pima County, Arizona, with respect to which the surface interests are owned
			 by such county, including in such lands located in Davidson Canyon, are
			 withdrawn from—

text.#text:
all federally owned subsurface interests
			 under the administrative jurisdiction of the

all forms of entry, appropriation and
			 disposal under the public land laws;

location, entry, and patent under the
			 mining laws; and

operation of the mineral leasing and
			 geothermal leasing laws, and the mineral materials laws; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
lands in Pima County, Arizona, are
			 withdrawn from entry, location, or patent under the general mining laws.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1183 IH: Southern Arizona Public Lands Protection Act of 2013
